title: ISRO NSIL Recruitment 2025 - Apply Offline for Chairman & Managing Director Posts
description: The ISRO New Space India Limited (ISRO NSIL) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 01 Chairman and Managing Director Posts. Interested and eligible candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their B.E./B. Tech, MBA, and Post-graduation students can apply for the ISRO NSIL Recruitment 2025. The interested applicants can apply in offline mode. Here we have mentioned the education det...
